GOVERNMENT Oli' ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 14 of 1983
Date of Assent: 8th April, 1983
An Act to authorise expenditure from the general revenues
of the Republic of the moneys required for the services
of the Republic during the financial year ending on the
31st December, 1983, not exceeding in the aggregate,
one thousand and sixty-one million, four hundred and
forty-nine thousand, eight hundred and sixty-three
kwacha.
[15th April, 1983
ENACTED by the Parliament of Zambia.. Enaotment
1. This Act may be cited as the Appropriation Act, 1983. Short
title
l. (1) On the authority of a. warrant issued by the President, Appro•
there may be expended from the general revenues of the Republic priatio:n
such moneys, not exceeding in the aggregate, one thousand and
sixty-one million, four hundred and forty-nine thousand,
eight hundred and sixty-three kwa.cha., as may be required
for the services of the Republic during the financial year
ending on the 31st December, 1983.
(2) The moneys mentioned in subsection (I) shall be appro­
priated to the services of the Republic mentioned in the second
column of the Schedule in a.mounts not exceeding the a.mounts
indicated in the third column thereof.
(3O)n the written authority of the Permanent Secretary,
Ministry of Finance, the amounts shown under the sub-heads
of the estimates may be varied:
Provided-
(i) the a.mounts appropriated to each head shall not
thereby be altered; and
(ii) any of the amounts shown under Head 320 or 321
shall not be varied.
